mapper.select:
select
FROM t_wl_material_classic a,t_wl_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.classic_id =#{natrualkey} limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_wl_material_classic where del_flag=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_wl_material_classic a,t_wl_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.del_flag=0
and ( a.classic_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or b.material_type_id like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or a.remark like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
select case when max(classic_id) is NULL then 0 else max(classic_id) end from t_wl_material_classic

select classic_id AS natrualkey, classic_name AS name from t_wl_material_classic where del_flag=0
and upper(classic_name) like concat('%',#{name},'%')
